intro.subtitle: I build things for the web.
intro.description: I’m a software engineer based in Lima, Peru from the Universidad Nacional de Ingenieria - Lima who knows a lot about math and is able to contact with english speakers.

about.title: About me
about.description1: Hello! I’m Piero, a software developer who enjoys building projects. I'm currently learning about Machine Learning too. I'm a disciplined and responsable person.
about.description2: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

services.title: Services
services.description: These are some interests and things I love:

services.title: Math
services.description: I am a person who has a high logical ability and I like mathematics: how it works or how it can be applied, and I enjoy solving mathematical problems, even more if the problems are the most difficult ones.

services.title: Programming
services.description: Programming has a lot of potential, and I'm interested for the moment in Data Science topics and Blockchain development.

services.title: Finance
services.description: If you're a fintech, well honestly I want to apply all of my knowledge to a proyect that's related to finance just now.

services.title: English
services.description: If you're from a english speaking country, no problem. I'm able to have conversations native english speakers.

services.title: Design
services.description: I make beautiful responsive websites that provide a comfortable experience to the client.

services.title: Teaching
services.description: I am able to guide people to understand a complex subject and master it. Even in case you have doubts you can ask me without problems and your doubts will be resolved. Ask me with confidence.

exp.title: Experience

experienceDescription: I was working in customer support.
I painted the hallway walls of the tenants.
I painted the house's bathroom and some rooms of the future tenants.
I sold Raffles on the street.
I earned 40 soles (13 usd) at most in one day.
I earned 50 soles (17 usd) at most in one day.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description1: These are some of my best projects.
projects.description2: If you wanna see more projects, only click at the button below
projectsLevelsDescription: I consider a project basic generally when they are simple static pages or projects that use slow logic.
I consider a project intermediate when it starts using more robust logic or using backend or logins.
I consider a project advanced when it takes more than a week, it can include testing, starts using complex algorithms, and is very functional.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I'm currenly improving my portfolio and my programming skills. I'm interested in working as Data Scientist for the future and currently I'm learning about Machine Learning. These are some skills that I have:
skills.front: I've been working with these technologies for the past 2 years. I'm able to do beautiful and functional responsive web-apps.
skills.back: I've been working with these technologies for around 1 year. I'm good at the SQL queries.
skills.extra: There are some technologies I've been working with, these are for Blockchain and Machine Learning areas, and also C++ which was my 1st programming language.
